attributes.action: make an exception to the Sexual Orientation Regulations for those who hold religious beliefs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to represent those who hold religious beliefs that would be violated with the passing of these regulations.  This is not to protest against the regulations being passed - the petitioner believes all people should be free to live how, where and what they may.  This is to ask that those who hold sacred religious beliefs are still able to live according to the dictates of their conscience as a result of these regulations.
